attributes.action: protect good tennants from abusive home owners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tennants who live peaceably and cause no nuisance should be protected from abusive homeowners through local government having the power to 'evict' owner occupiers who cause nuisance, violence, abusive conduct, sell drugs etc. Homeowners can be nuisance neighbours too,currently with every right to stay put.
